# Input

Inputs: Users can upload their collection of adjacency matrices into R in 3 ways

1.  Upload a single .xlsx file with each sheet storing a different adjacency matrix

2.  Select a folder that contains multiple .xlsx files that each have a single sheet storing an adjacency matrix

3.  Select a folder that contains multiple .csv files, one for each adjacency matrix

```{r setup}
library(fcmconfr)
```
